roleset.name: sell off government property
roleset.note: DENATIONALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'denationalize' based on semi-automatic expansion from 'privatize'. (from denationalize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: ...nor can the government easily back down on promised protection for a privatized company while it-1 proceeds with controversial plans *trace*-1 to denationalize most of Britain's water and electricity industries.
example.arg: most of Britain's water and electricity industries
